Uses of Class
org.springframework.messaging.handler.invocation.AbstractAsyncReturnValueHandler

  • Packages that use AbstractAsyncReturnValueHandler 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.messaging.handler.invocation
    Common infrastructure for invoking message handler methods.

    • Uses of AbstractAsyncReturnValueHandler in org.springframework.messaging.handler.invocation

      Subclasses of AbstractAsyncReturnValueHandler in org.springframework.messaging.handler.invocation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CompletableFutureReturnValueHandler
      Support for CompletableFuture (and as of 4.3.7 also CompletionStage) as a return value type.
      class  ListenableFutureReturnValueHandler
      Support for ListenableFuture as a return value type.
      class  ReactiveReturnValueHandler
      Support for single-value reactive types (like Mono or Single) as a return value type.
